1456080.name: Abyss Delvers
1456080.description:
Abyss Delvers is an Online Hack'n'Slash Action RPG. Adventure out alone or party up with your friends on an epic journey and fight the monstrous hordes of the Abyss.

GAME FEATURES

  • Campaign
    Venture out and unveil the secrets of the Abyss in an epic 4 act journey.
  • Abyss Charts
    Randomly generated campaigns. Each Abyss Chart layout is different, choose your path to modify the rewards, monsters, area layout and more...
  • Online co-op with up to 6 players
    Crush monsters together with friends, or befriend new ones you may find along the way in the safe zones.
  • Procedural Generation
    Explore new areas, discover secrets and avoid deadly traps in a randomly generated world.
  • 4 unique classes - 12 unique skill trees
    Play as the Warrior, Hunter, Warlock or Sorcerer. Each class have 3 unique skill trees to combine and specialize in. (More classes in development)
  • Ability Augmentation
    Augment your abilities with Ability Runes. Increase the damage and area-of-effect, reduce the cooldown and resource cost, or make your ability spawn forth an abyssal monster to fight for you - endless possibilities!
  • Abyssal Soul Passive Tree
    Slay the Lords of the Abyss, consume their soul and spend it in the massive Abyssal Soul Passive Tree to gain their powers.
  • Contracts
    Randomly generated quests found throughout the world. Sell the contracts for a small price, or fulfill its goals and receive rewards! The harder the contract, the greater the loot.
  • Hardcore mode
    Your deeds will be remembered.
1456080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
